info.title: Steps after the &productname; installation is complete

abstract.para: Once the &productname; installation is finished, follow these tasks to complete the initial setup and configuration.

step.para: Log in to &productname; &owui; using the default credentials.
After you have logged in, update the administrator password for &productname;.
From the available language models, configure the one you prefer. Optionally, install a custom language model.
Configure user management with role-base access control (RBAC) as described in
Integrate single sign-on authentication manager—such as &okta;—with &owui; as described in .
Configure retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) to let the model process content relevant to the customer.
